job_title: Personal Companion in Story City, IA
pros: One of my favorite things about Bethany is that when new problems arise - as happens - they are quick and efficient at developing ways to deal with it. For example, there was some stuff going on with anonymous posters literally making up things online (was proven to be made up) and within two days we get a notice that the management team has already implemented a team to deal with it specifically. Just really neat that they quickly rise to deal with new challenges. They are great staff, very friendly and actually will listen to you.
cons: My biggest "downside" is that we tend to be short staffed and though the handbook says "points for tardy" there's rarely discipline that happens so certain staff (not many) will abuse it and cause stress for the rest of the staff to constantly cover which can become stressful. While I do appreciate being lenient in some situations - it is hard when other staff abuse it and cause stress on us. HOWEVER I think a large part of that issue is more certain staff that usually don't work out anyway - not Bethany as a whole. Other downside is there can be a lot of gossip. My personal manager is good at stopping it, but it still happens behind the scenes and it's hard when rumors start flying. But for the most part that isn't a problem

cons: I don't have a con at this time.  I love everything about my job and the work everyone does here at Bethany Life!
